title: 16 Western-Inspired Looks That Feel Fresh and Modern
description: These hero items deserve a spot in your ranch-girl era.
excerpt: If you're looking for the best western accessories and clothes, you've come to the right place. Find all of the rodeo-ready, editor-approved items here.
text: Frankies Bikinis x Bella Hadid Nick Triangle Bikini TopWith strategically placed laces, Bella Hadid and Frankies Bikinis turned a floral triangle bikini into the ultimate Western statement. Grab the matching bottoms for a chic moment at the beach.8 Other Reasons Paloma ScarvesDon’t want to make a huge investment in the trend? Bandanas are a subtle way to lean into the moment. Bonus tip: Wear yours with a minimal outfit for easy styling.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFrame Le Easy High Waist Flare JeansFlare jeans are the foundation of every western wardrobe. This pair is the cream of the crop with a fitted silhouette throughout the hips and thighs that makes them look tailored for you.Free People Brayden Western BootWe can’t talk about the trend without mentioning boots. You could pair it with a white maxi skirt for undeniable sophistication or grab the matching shorts.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowGimaguas Diane SkirtFringe details are a hallmark of the western era. html:
Frankies Bikinis x Bella Hadid Nick Triangle Bikini Top

With strategically placed laces, Bella Hadid and Frankies Bikinis turned a floral triangle bikini into the ultimate Western statement. Grab the matching bottoms for a chic moment at the beach.

8 Other Reasons Paloma Scarves

Don’t want to make a huge investment in the trend? Bandanas are a subtle way to lean into the moment. Bonus tip: Wear yours with a minimal outfit for easy styling.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Frame Le Easy High Waist Flare Jeans

Flare jeans are the foundation of every western wardrobe. This pair is the cream of the crop with a fitted silhouette throughout the hips and thighs that makes them look tailored for you.

Free People Brayden Western Boot

We can’t talk about the trend without mentioning boots. This pair includes an embroidered metallic toe that will look great with nearly any outfit.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Jenny Bird Lydia Bolo Tie

As we mentioned earlier, less is more. Something as simple as a chic necklace can elevate your entire outfit, especially when it’s this beautifully crafted design.

Nili Lotan Audrey Paisley Silk Halterneck Camisole

Paisley has never looked better, thanks to Nili Lotan’s halterneck top. You could pair it with a white maxi skirt for undeniable sophistication or grab the matching shorts.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Gimaguas Diane Skirt

Fringe details are a hallmark of the western era. Instead of long tassels, reach for an option that includes metallic sequins like this sweet skirt.

8 Other Reasons Cowboy Hat

A cowboy hat might feel too out there for some. But this affordable option lets you test the waters without a huge commitment.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Khaite Nevada Ankle Stretch Boot

Animal print is an essential this season, and no brand does it better than Khaite. In this version of the brand’s wildly popular Nevada boot, you get the best of both worlds with a chic colorblocking technique.

Staud Alana Beaded Fringe Shoulder Bag

Playful beads merge with dangling fringe in Staud’s latest bag drop. The brand didn’t stop there. They added the perfect finishing touches with a western-inspired buckle and belt.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sea New York Priscilla Vest

If you want to lean into the romantic side of the ranch aesthetic, Sea’s floral vest is a must. The side features peekaboo details that show a bit of skin.

Aureum No. 2 Stud Leather Belt

Never underestimate the power of a great belt. Aureum’s studded beauty will make even the simplest outfits a sartorial success.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Paris Texas Jessica Western 35 Pumps

Turn up the fun with these denim-inspired kitten heels. They’ll look great dressed up or down.

Valentino Garavani Nellcôte Fringe Shoulder Bag

Maximalists, rejoice! Valentino’s lust-worthy bag pulls out all of the stops, from fringe to pearls to grommets.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Lamarque x REVOLVE Rodeo Buckle Belt

You can never go wrong with a classic belt. This one includes a plaque buckle that channels the western spirit.

Miu Miu Western Knee-High Boots

For a modern take on the cowboy boot, turn to Miu Miu’s knee-highs, which feature contrasting white trimming along the shaft and pull tabs.
